description: Detects specific process characteristics of Chinese TAIDOOR RAT malware load Author: Florian Roth. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: TAIDOOR RAT DLL Load
query: (process.command_line:(*dll,MyStart* OR *dll\ MyStart*) OR (process.command_line:*\ MyStart AND process.command_line:*rundll32.exe*))
